turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want four small chicken barbecue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want chicken bbq for all 4 pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any other requests for your pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please add a gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you are ordering 4 small gluten free chicken bbq pizzas, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $52, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, will you be dining in, picking up or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what option are you choosing?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want delivered.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please note that this does not include tip for the driver.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be delivered in 35 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Thanks for ordering.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.
